price: Anaasε wo Wura Nyankopͻn akoradeε no wͻ wͻn hͻ? Anaasε wͻn wͻ so tumi?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
